name: NestedScrollView
desc: A scrolling view inside of which can be nested other scrolling views, with their scroll positions being intrinsically linked.

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: An object that can be used to control the position to which the outer scroll view is scrolled.

fields.name: reverse
fields.desc: Whether the scroll view scrolls in the reading direction.

fields.name: physics
fields.desc: How the scroll view should respond to user input.

fields.name: headerSliverBuilder
fields.desc: A builder for any widgets that are to precede the inner scroll views (as given by [body]).

fields.name: body
fields.desc: The widget to show inside the [NestedScrollView].

fields.name: floatHeaderSlivers
fields.desc: Whether or not the [NestedScrollView]'s coordinator should prioritize the outer scrollable over the inner when scrolling back.
